examples.example: 这次商家推出的优惠活动，真是让顾客们得到了实实在在的好处。

translate.english: The preferential activities launched by this merchant this time really allow customers to get tangible benefits.

examples.example: 这次的购物之旅非常愉快，商家提供了很多优惠，让我感觉特别划算。

translate.english: This shopping trip was very pleasant, and the merchants provided a lot of discounts, making me feel especially cost-effective.

examples.example: 这次超市的优惠力度很大，吸引了众多顾客前来购物。

translate.english: The preferential strength of this supermarket is very great, attracting a large number of customers to come shopping.
